titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide funding for air cargo jetports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/29/1995--Introduced. Amends Federal transportation law to define "air cargo jetport" to mean a public airport used or intended to be used substantially for the shipping of cargo by air. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to use at least three percent of funds made available for airport planning and development and noise compatibility planning for grants for air cargo jetports.
